# Nominasi Anggota Dewan Komisaris dan Direksi

# Nomination of Members of the Board of Commissioners and Board of Directors

# Prosedur Nominasi

Kebijakan dan prosedur pescalonan anggota Dewan Komisaris dan Direksi Perseroan dijelaskan secara ringkas di bawah ini.

1. Pencilan calon anggota Dewan Komisaris dan/atau Direksi yang diusulkan oleh Dewan Komisaris pada Direksi pada Pemegang Saham disampaikan kepada Dewan Komisaris yang bertindak sebagai Komite Nominasi dan Remunerasi.  
2. Dewan Komisarispekukanan pemilihan calon Komisaris dan/atau Direksi melalui proses yang meliputi:

a. Analisis terhadap rekam jejak dan kompetensi calon anggota Komisaris dan/atau Direksi;  
b. Wawancara terhadap calon; dan  
c. Apabila diperlukan, Penilaian Kemampuan dan Kepatutan (Fit and Proper Test) yang dilakukan oleh Penilai Independen.

3. Dewan Komisaris -, kan rekomendasi calon Komisaris dan/atau Direktur terpilih kepada Pemegang Saham Pengendali.  
4. Dewan Komisaris meminta persetujuan Pemegang Saham Pengendali atas calon terpilih.  
5. Calon Komisaris dan/atau Direktur diusulkan kepada RUPS Tahunan untuk mendapatkan persetujuan sebagai anggota Dewan Komisaris dan/atau Direksi.

Tata cara penilaian anggota Dewan Komisaris dan Direksi dapat dilihat pada sub-bab "Penilaian Kinerja Direksi dan Dewan Komisaris" di atas.

# Fungsi Nominasi

Perusahaan belum memiliki Komite Nominasi dan Remunerasi. Fungsi Nominasi difalankan oleh Dewan Komisaris.

# Nomination Procedure

The Company's policy and procedure for nominating members of the Board of Commissioners and Board of Directors is explained briefly below.

1. The nomination of the candidate Commissioners and/or Directors proposed by the Board of Commissioners or Board of Directors or Shareholders is submitted to the Board of Commissioners, which serves as the Nomination and Remuneration Committee.  
2. The Board of Commissioners conducts the selection of the candidate Commissioners and/or Directors through a process that includes following:

a. Analysis of the track records and competencies of the candidate Commissioners and/or Directors;  
b. Interview of the candidates; and  
c. If necessary, a Fit and Proper Test conducted by an Independent Assessor.

3. The Board of Commissioners submits the recommendation on the selected candidate Commissioner and/or Director to the Controlling Shareholder.  
4. The Board of Commissioners requests the approval of the Controlling Shareholder for the selected candidate.  
5. The candidate Commissioner and/or Director is proposed to the Annual General Meeting of Shareholders to be approved as a member of the Board of Commissioners and/or Board of Directors.

The procedure for assessing members of the Board of Commissioners and Board of Directors can be seen in the sub-chapter "Performance Assessment of the Board of Directors and Board of Commissioners" above.

# Nomination Function

The Company does not have a Nomination and Remuneration Committee. The Nomination function is carried out by the Board of Commissioners.

# Remunerasi Anggota Dewan Komisaris dan Direksi

# Remuneration of Members of the Board of Commissioners and Board of Directors

# Kebijakan Remunerasi

Perseroan bertujuan untuk memberikan remunerasi yang kompetitif kepada para Komisaris dan Direksi yang@cukup untuk menarik dan mempertahankan individu-individu berkaliber tinggi,serta sesuai dengan tanggung jawab, keterampilan dan pengalaman,mereka. Rapat Umum Pemegang Saham Tahunan (RUPST)menentukan,jumlah remunerasi tahun yang dibayarkan kepada Komisaris berdasarkan kinerja individu dan kinerja Perseroan secara keseluruhan.Kewenangan untuk menentukan,jumlah remunerasi bagi Direksi didelegasikan oleh RUPST kepada Dewan Komisaris.Pada tahun 2024,RUPSTmenyetujui telah remunerasi yang dibayarkan kepada Dewan Komisaris akan mencapat maksimum  $5 \%$  dari gaji/honorarium tahun sebelumnya.

# Fungsi Remunerasi

Perusahaan belum memiliki Komite Nominasi dan Remunerasi. Fungsi remunerasi dijalankan oleh Dewan Komisaris.

# Struktur Remunerasi

Remunerasi yang diferikan Perusahaan terdiri dari uang jasa ata honorarium bulanananya berbagai tunjangan.

# Prosedur penetapan dan pengusulan bescharan remunerasi Direksi dan Dewan Komisaris

1. RUPST mendelegasikan wewenang untuk menentukan jumlah remunerasi kepada Dewan Komisaris.  
2. Dewan Komisaris menelaah remunerasi tahun berjalan dan menetapkan,isaran remunerasi yang bara, dengan mempertimbangkan kinerja dan kondisi keuanganan Perseroan, kinerja masing-masing anggota Dewan Komisaris dan Direksi, serta makukan kajian terhadap tolok ukur kompensasi yang dibayarkan oleh perusahaan sejenis.  
3. Dewan Komisaris mengusulkan menjadi yang telah direvisi kepada Rapat Umum Pemegang Saham Tahunan untuk mendapatkan pemesahan.

# Remuneration Policy

The Company aims to offer its Commissioners and Directors a competitive remuneration that is sufficient to attract and retain high caliber individuals and matches their responsibilities, skills and experience. The Annual General Meeting of Shareholders (AGMS) determines the annual amount of remuneration paid to the Commissioners based on their individual performance and the overall performance of the Company. The authority to determine the remuneration amount for the Directors is delegated by the AGMS to the Board of Commissioners. In 2024, the AGMS agreed that the remuneration paid to the Board of Commissioners should increase by a maximum of  $5\%$  of the previous year's salary/honorarium.

# Remuneration Function

The Company does not have a Nomination and Remuneration Committee. The remuneration function is carried out by the Board of Commissioners.

# Remuneration Structure

The remuneration paid by the Company consists of a monthly salary or honorarium as well as various allowances.

# Procedure for determining and proposing the remuneration amount of Board of Directors and Board of Commissioners

1. The AGMS delegates the authority to determine the remuneration amount to the Board of Commissioners.  
2. The Board of Commissioners reviews the current year's remuneration and determines the new amount, taking into consideration the Company's performance and financial condition, the performance of each member of the Board of Commissioners and Board of Directors, and benchmark reviews of the compensation paid at peer companies.  
3. The Board of Commissioners proposes the revised amount to the Annual General Meeting of Shareholders for their endorsement.

# Komite Audit

# Audit Committee

Komite Audit merupakan badan independen yang mendukung Dewan Komisaris dalam melaksanakan fungsi pengawasan dengan memberikan kepastian atas integritas laporan keuangan Perusahaan dan kepadahan hukum, mengkaji efektivitas sistem manajemen risiko, pengendalian internal serta audit internal, dan mengawai audit eksternal. Temuanmereka memungkinkan Manajemen untuk mengidentifikasi risiko dan potensi kelemahan, yang diperbaiki oleh departemen terkait.

# Dasar Hukum Pembentukan Komite Audit

Komite Audit dibentuk seksuai dengan hukum dan peraturan perundang-undangan berikut:

- POJK No. 55/POJK.04/2015 tanggal 23 Desember 2015向着 Pembentukan dan Pedoman Pelaksanaan Kerja Komite Audit;  
- POJK No. 33/POJK.04/2014 tanggal 8 Desember 2014向着 Direksi dan Dewan Komisaris Emiten kepada Perusahaan Publik.

# Keanggotaan & Pengangkatan Komite Audit

Komite Audit diketuai oleh Komisaris Independen Perusahaan dan beranggotakan dual orang lainnya yang tidak terafiliasi dengan Perusahaan. Dua dari anggota Komite Audit memiliki pengalaman profesional di bidang akuntansi. Dengan demikian, komposisi Komite Audit telah memenuhi ketentuan Peraturan OJK No. 55/POJK.04/2015.

Anggota Komite Audit diangkat oleh Dewan Komisaris untuk masa jabatan yang tidak boleh melebihi命名为 jabatan Dewan Komisaris secara ini. Anggota dapat diangkat untukuminium periode berikutnya. Semua anggota harus memenuhi persyaratan keanggotaan yang ditentukan dalam Piagam Komite Audit.

The Audit Committee is an independent body that supports the Board of Commissioners supervision function by providing assurance on the integrity of the Company's financial disclosures and legal compliance, reviewing the effectiveness of risk management, internal controls and the internal audit, and overseeing the external audit. Their oversight assists Management in identifying risks and potential weaknesses, so that they can be addressed by the departments concerned.

# Legal Basis for the Establishment of the Audit Committee

The Audit Committee was established in accordance with the following laws and regulations:

FSA Regulation No. 55/POJK.04/2015 dated 23 December 2015 concerning the Establishment and Working Guidelines of Audit Committees;  
FSA Regulation No. 33/POJK.04/2014 dated 8 December 2014 concerning the Board of Directors and Board of Commissioners of an Issuer or Public Company.

# Audit Committee Membership & Appointment

The Audit Committee is chaired by the Company's Independent Commissioner and includes two other members who are not affiliated with the Company. Two of the members have professional accounting experience. The composition of the Audit Committee therefore complies with the provisions of FSA Regulation No. 55/POJK.04/2015.

Members of the Audit Committee are appointed by the Board of Commissioners for a term that must not exceed the term of the current Board of Commissioners. Members may be appointed for one subsequent term. All members must fulfill the membership requirements specified in the Audit Committee Charter.

# Pernyataan Independensi Komite Audit

Berdasarkan ketentuan Peraturan OJK No. 55/POJK.04/2015  
tentang Pembentukan dan Pedoman Pelaksanaan Kerja Komite Audit, Piagam Komite Audit menetapkan bahwa anggota harus memenuhi kriteria independensi sebagai berikut:

1. Anggota Komite Audit bukan merupakan orang dalam Kantor Akuntan Publik, Kantor Konsultan Hukum, Kantor Jasa Penilai Publik untuk pihak lain yang memberi jasa asurans, jasa non-asurans, jasa penilai dan/atau jasa konsultasi lain kepada Emiten untuk Perusahaan Publik yang bersangkutan dalam waktu 6 (enam) bulan terakhir;  
2. Anggota Komite Audit bukan merupakan orang yang bekerja ataumpunyai wewenang dan tanggung jawab untuk merencanakan, memimpin, mengendalan, atau mengawasi kegiatan Emiten ata Perusahaan Publik tersebut dalam waktu 6 (enam) bulan terakhir, kecuali Komisaris Independen;  
3. Anggota Komite Audit tidak mempunyai saham langsung maupun tidak langsung pada Perusahaan;  
4. Anggota Komite Audit tidak mempunyai hubungan Afiliasi dengan anggota Dewan Komisaris, anggota Direksi, kepada Pemegang Saham Utama Perusahaan;  
5. Anggota Komite Audit tidak mempunyai hubungan usaha baik langsung maupun tidak langsung yang Berkaitan dengan kegiatan usaha Perusahaan.

# Audit Committee Duties and Responsibilities

Based on the provisions of FSA Regulation No. 55/POJK.04/2015 regarding the Establishment and Working Guidelines of Audit Committees, the Audit Committee Charter specifies that members must meet the following independence criteria:

1. Members of the Audit Committee are not persons in the Public Accounting Firm, Legal Consultant Firm, Public Appraisal Service Office or other parties that provide assurance services, non-assurance services, appraisal services and/or other consulting services to the Issuer or Public Company concerned within the last 6 (six) months;  
2. Audit Committee members have not worked for or had the authority and responsibility to plan, lead, control, or supervise the activities of the Issuer or Public Company within the last 6 (six) months, except for Independent Commissioners;  
3. Audit Committee members do not have direct or indirect shares in the Company;  
4. Audit Committee members have no affiliation with members of the Board of Commissioners, members of the Board of Directors, or Main Shareholders of the Company;  
5. Audit Committee members have no direct or indirect business relationship related to the business activities of the Company.

Seluruh anggota Komite Audit, soit insudah memenuhi kriteria di atas dan selelu melaksanakan tugas dan tanggung jawab secara independen.

# Pengembangan Kompetensi Anggota Komite Audit

Dalam rangka menjalankan tanggung jawabnya secara efektif, anggota Komite Audit diharapkan selelu mengetahui perkembangan terkini terkait hal-hal yang Berkaitan dengan fungsinya. Perusahaan tidak mengadakan pelatihan untuk pengembangan kompetensi khusus bagi anggota Komite Audit selama tahun 2024.

# Piagam Komite Audit

Piagam Komite Audit, yang disahkan pada tanggal 29 Juni 2016, membuat tugas, tanggung jawab, dan wewenang Komite Audit. Piagam tersebut dapat dilihat di situs web Perusahaan, www.jayaproperty.com.

Piagam Komite Audit meliputi hal-hal seksagai berikut:

1. Dasar Peraturan;  
2. Tujuan;  
3. Komposisi, Struktur, dan Keanggotaan;  
4. Persyaratan Keanggotaan dan Masa Jabatan;  
5. Tugas, Tanggung Jawab, dan Wewenang;  
6. Tata Cara dan Prosedur Kerja;  
7. Kebijakan Penyelenggaraan Rapat;  
8. Pelaporan.

# Tugas dan Tanggung Jawab Komite Audit

Tugas dan tanggung jawab Komite Audit, sebagai manada dijelaskan dalam Piagam, adalah sebagai berikut:

- Melakukan penelaahan atas informasi keuangan yang dikeluarkan Perseroan;  
- Memberikan rekomendasi kepada Dewan Komisaris mengenai penunjukan atas penunjukan ulang dari auditor eksternal;  
- Melakukan penelaahan atas ketaatan terhadap peraturan perundang-undanganasar modal dan peraturan lain yang berlaku;  
- Menjaga kerahasiaan dokumen, data, dan informasi Perseroan;  
- Menelaah dan mencurveluasi telah audit yang tidakkan oleh audit internal.

# Wewenang Komite Audit

Komite Audit memiliki wewenang untuk mengaksi setiap dan semua dokumen, data dan informasi{serta catatan yang Berkaitan dengan karyawan, dana, aset, dan sumber daya Perusahaan lainnya,agar dapat menjalankan tugasnya secara efektif.Selain itu,Komite Audit juga berwenang untuk Berkumunikasi langsung dengan karyawan mana pun,jika perlu, dan memperoleh bantuan eksternal, jika diperlukan.

All members of the Audit Committee currently fulfill the above criteria and always carry out their duties and responsibilities independently.

# Competency Development for Audit Committee Members

In order to carry out their responsibilities effectively, members of the Audit Committee are expected to always be aware of the latest developments in matters related to their functions. The Company did not conduct any special training or competency development for Audit Committee members during 2024.

# Audit Committee Charter

The Audit Committee Charter, which was adopted on June  $29^{\text{th}}$ , 2016, specifies the duties, responsibilities and authority of the Audit Committee. The Charter can be seen on the Company's website, www.jayaproperty.com.

The Audit Committee Charter covers the following topics:

1. Regulatory Basis;  
2. Purpose;  
3. Composition, Structure and Membership;  
4. Membership Requirements and Term of Office;  
5. Duties, Responsibilities and Authority;  
6. Working Procedures;  
7. Meeting Policy;  
8. Reporting.

# Audit Committee Duties and Responsibilities

The Audit Committee's duties and responsibilities, as described in the Charter, are to:

Review the financial information disclosed by the Company;  
Make recommendations to the Board of Commissioners on the appointment or reappointment of the external auditor;  
- Review the Company's compliance with capital market laws and other relevant regulations;  
- Ensure the confidentiality of corporate documents, data and information;  
- Review and evaluate the audits performed by the internal audit unit.

# Audit Committee Authority

The Audit Committee has the authority to access any and all documents, data and information and records relating to the Company's employees, funds, assets, and other resources, in the course of effectively executing its duties. In addition, the Committee is authorized to communicate directly with any of the employees, if necessary, and to seek external assistance if required.

# Rapat Komite Audit

Komite Audit entwickan rapat paling sedikit sekali setiapt tiga bulan, sebagai manana disyaratkan oleh Piagam Komite Audit dan Peraturan OJK No. 55/POJK.04/2015. Untuk mencapai kuorum, setup rapat harus dihadiri lebih dari  $50\%$  dari jumlah anggota, dan risalah rapat harus dilaporkan kepada Dewan Komisaris.

Komite Audit entwickan 56 kali rapat pada tahun 2024 dan 1 kali rapat bersama Unit Audit Internal, dengan tingkat kehadiran  $100\%$ .

# Audit Committee Meetings

The Audit Committee meets at least once every quarter, as required by the Audit Committee Charter and FSA Regulation No. 55/POJK.04/2015. To reach a quorum, each meeting should be attended by more than  $50\%$  of the members, and the minutes of every meeting must be reported to the Board of Commissioners.

The Audit Committee held 56 meetings in 2024 and 1 meeting with the Internal Audit Unit, with an attendance rate of  $100\%$ .

# Fungsi Nominasi dan Remunerasi

# Nomination and Remuneration Function

Fungsi nominasi dan remunerasi dijalankan oleh Dewan Komisaris. Oleh karena itu, Perusahaan tidak memiliki Komite Nominasi dan Remunerasi tersendiri. Dewan Komisaris Perusahaan bertindak independen dalam menjalankan fungsi nominasi dan remunerasi.

Untuk mendukung pelaksanaan fungsi nominasi dan numerasi, Dewan Komisaris mencaku pada Pedoman dan Tata Tertib Kerja Fungsi Nominasi dan Remunerasi (piagam). Piagam Fungsi Nominasi dan Remunerasi yang disahkan pada tanggal 3 Januari 2017 mengatur tugas, tanggung jawab dan wewenang Dewan Komisaris dalam menjalankan fungsi nominasi dan remunerasi. Piagam tersebut dapat dilihat di situs web Perseroan, www.jayaproperty.com.

# Tugas dan Tanggung Jawab Dewan Komisaris dalam Menjalankan Fungsi Nominasi dan Remunerasi

Tugas dan tanggung jawab Dewan Komisaris dalam menjalankan Fungsi Nominasi, sebagai mania dijelaskan dalam Pedoman, telah menjadi berikut:

- Mengatur komposisi jabatan anggota Direksi dan/atau anggota Dewan Komisaris;  
- Mengatur kebijakan dan kriteria yang dibutuhkan dalam proses Nominasi;  
- Mengatur kebijakan evaluasi kinerja bagi anggota Direksi dan/atau anggota Dewan Komisaris;

The nomination and remuneration functions are performed by the Board of Commissioners. The Company therefore does not have a separate Nomination and Remuneration Committee. The Company's Board of Commissioners acts independently in carrying out the nomination and remuneration function.

To support its implementation of the nomination and remuneration function, the Board of Commissioners refers to the Nomination and Remuneration Function Manual (charter). The Nomination and Remuneration Function Charter, approved on January  $3^{\text{rd}}$ , 2017, stipulates the duties, responsibilities and authorities of the Board of Commissioners in performing the nomination and remuneration function. The charter can be viewed on the Company's website, www.jayaproperty.com.

# Duties and Responsibilities of the Board of Commissioners in Carrying Out the Nomination and Remuneration Function

The duties and responsibilities of the Board of Commissioners in carrying out the Nomination Function, as described in the charter, are as follows:

Regulate the composition of positions for members of the Board of Directors and/or members of the Board of Commissioners;  
- Set the policies and criteria required for the Nomination process;  
- Set the performance evaluation policy for members of the Board of Directors and/or members of the Board of Commissioners;

- Melakukan penilaian kinerja anggota Direksi dan/atau anggota Dewan Komisaris berdasarkan tolok ukur yang telah disusun sebagai bahan evaluasi;  
- Mengatur program pengembangan kemampuan anggota Direksi dan/atau anggota Dewan Komisaris;  
- Mengusulkan calon yang memenuhi syarat sebagai anggota Direksi dan/atau anggota Dewan Komisaris untuk disampaikan kepada RUPS.

Tugas dan tanggung jawab Dewan Komisaris dalam menjalankan Fungsi Remunerasi, sebagai mana dijelaskan dalam Pedoman, adalah sebagai berikut:

- Menyusun struktur Remunerasi bagi anggota Direksi dan/atau anggota Dewan Komisaris;  
- Menyusun kebijakan atas Remunerasi bagi anggota Direksi dan/atau anggota Dewan Komisaris;  
- Menyusun比分an之作 Remunerasi bagi anggota Direksi dan/atau anggota Dewan Komisaris.

The Company believes that the nomination and remuneration function can still be carried out by the Board of Commissioners such that the Company does not need to establish a Nomination and Remuneration Committee.

# Duties and Responsibilities of Corporate Secretary

The duties and responsibilities of the Corporate Secretary, as set forth in the Company's Articles of Association and FSA Regulation No. 35/POJK.04/2014, are as follows:

- Keep up with developments in the Capital Market, especially the prevailing laws and regulations in the Capital Market and monitor the Company's compliance with the Company Law and other laws and regulations, the Articles of Association, as well as FSA and IDX regulations, and coordinate with the Legal Department in connection with corporate actions;  
- Provide input to the Board of Directors and Board of Commissioners of the Company to comply with the provisions of laws and regulations in the Capital Market;  
- Maintain all corporate documents, including minutes of Shareholders Meetings, and minutes of Board of Commissioners and Board of Directors' meetings;  
- Assist the Board of Directors and Board of Commissioners in the implementation of corporate governance, which includes:

- Disclosure of information to the public, including the availability of information on the Company's website;  
- Submission of reports to the Financial Services Authority, Indonesia Stock Exchange, Bank Indonesia, and INTRAC on time as required;  
- Organization and documentation of the General Meeting of Shareholders;  
- Organization and documentation of Board of Directors' meetings and Board of Commissioners meetings;  
- Implementation of company orientation program for the Board of Directors and Board of Commissioners;  
Monitoring the composition of members of the Board of Commissioners, Board of Directors, Audit Committee, and Internal Audit Unit to ensure that they always fulfill the requirements as stipulated in the Financial Services Authority Regulation.

Prepare the Company's Annual Report;  
Prepare the Company's Sustainability Report;  
Act as a liaison between the Company and the Company's shareholders, the Financial Services Authority, and other stakeholders;  
- Ensure that shareholders, the media, investors, analysts and public are appropriately and regularly informed of the Company's actions, financial position and other material matters;  
- Maintain and update the material on the Company's website so that it always meets the requirements as stipulated in POJK No. 8/POJK.04/2015 and other FSA and IDX regulations regarding information disclosure to the public.

Sistem pengendalian internal Perusahaan dirancang untuk memberikan jaminanyang wajar atas pengendalian keuangan dan operasional, manajemen risiko, dan kepadauhan terhadap peraturan perundang-undangan. Hal ini memungkinkan Perusahaan untuk mendeteksi dan memperbaiki kelemahan dengan segera dan dengan demikian membantu mengurangi risiko kegagalan dalam mencapai tujuan Perusahaan.

Kerangka pengendalian internal terdiri dari semua mekanisme, standar, dan prosedur yang kami terapkan untuk memastikan integritas informasi keuangan, memastikan akuntabilitas, dan mencegah penipuan. Kerangka ini juga mengabungkansystem管理水平ien kualitas kami, yang disertifikasi dengan standar ISO 9001:2015, yang menunjukkan Perusahaan telah mematuhi praktik secara internasionalARPentang管理水平ien mutu.

Sistem pengendalian internal diawasi dan dievaluasi oleh Audit Internal, yang melaporkan temuannya kepada Direktur Utama danmerekomendasikan tindakan perbaikan jika ditemukan kekurangan. Praktik audit internal Perusahaan dilakukan dengan meng gunakan standar yang diterima secara internal yang ditetapkan oleh Committee of Sponsoring Organizations of the Treadway Commission (COSO).

Berdasarkan temuan tersebut, Manajemen说我mpulkan telah mengendalian internal sudah memadai untuk ruang lingkup dan skala bisnis soit ini dan berfungsi secara efektif.

Kepatuhan kami terhadap standar ISO 9001:2015 ditinjau dua kali dalam setahun oleh Tim MR ISO Perusahaan{serta audit eksternal setup tahun.

The Company's internal control system is designed to provide reasonable assurance over financial and operational controls, risk management, and compliance with laws and regulations. This enables the Company to detect and correct weaknesses promptly and thereby helps reduce the risk of failure to achieve the Company's objectives.

The internal control framework comprises all the mechanisms, standards and procedures we deploy to ensure the integrity of financial information, ensure accountability and prevent fraud. This includes our corporate governance framework, code of conduct, control activities also information and communication systems. It also incorporates our quality management system, which is certified to ISO 9001:2015 standard, indicating that the Company complies with international best practices on quality management.

The internal control system is supervised and evaluated by the Internal Audit, which reports its findings to the President Director and recommends remedial actions if any deficiencies are found. The Company's internal audit practices conform to the internally accepted standards issued by the Committee of Sponsoring Organizations of the Treadway Commission (COSO).

The Audit Committee is a significant component of the internal control due to its oversight of financial and operational aspects, particularly in relation to the use of prudential principles in the preparation and presentation of financial statements and in managing risks.

# Evaluation of Internal Control Effectiveness in 2024

To assess the effectiveness of the Company's internal financial and operational processes and controls, the Internal Audit and the Audit Committee performed a series of audits and tests and submitted their findings and recommendations to the President Director and the Board of Commissioners. Based on the findings, Management has concluded that the internal controls are adequate for the current scope and scale of the business and are functioning effectively.

Our ISO 9001:2015 compliance undergoes twice-yearly reviews by the Company's MR ISO Team as well as an external quality audit every year.

# Sistem Manajemen Risiko

# Risk Management System

# Gambaran Umum

Kelangsungan dan pertumbuhan bisnis kami dalam jangka panjang bergantung pada kemampuan kami untuk mengidentifikasi dan mengelola risiko, baik internal maupun eksternal, yang dapat berdampak negatif terhadap kinerja, kelayakan financier, dan reputasi Perusahaan. Oleh karena itu,SYSTEM manajemen risiko kami dirancang untuk mendeteksi dan memantau risiko yang munculserta menilai probabilitas dan dampak potensialnya. Kami kemudian mengembangkan strategi dan tindakan mitigasi yang tepat berdasarkan selera risiko Perusahaan, atas tingkat risiko yang dapat diterima. Profil risiko Perusahaan ditinjau dan diperbarui secara berkala.

Manajemen memiliki tanggung jawab keseluruhan atas manajemen risiko. Namun, sejalan dengan budaya risiko di seluruh Perusahaan, setiap unit bisnis bertanggung jawab untuk mengidentifikasi dan mengelola risiko sesuai dengan kewenangannya masing-masing.

# Jenis Risiko dan Cara Pengelolaannya

Risiko utama yang secara material dapat berdampak pada kinerja Perusahaan, dan tindakan mitigasi terkait yang telah kami lakukan, dijelaskan di bawah.

# Overview

The continuity and growth of our business over the long term depends in part on our ability to effectively identify and manage risks, internal and external, that could negatively impact the Company's performance, financial viability, and reputation. Therefore, Our risk management system is designed to detect and monitor emerging risks and assess their probability and potential impact. We then develop appropriate mitigation strategies and actions based on the Company's risk appetite or level of acceptable risk. The Company's risk profile is regularly reviewed and updated.

The Management has overall responsibility for risk management. However, in line with our Company-wide risk culture, each business unit is responsible for identifying and managing local risks in accordance with their authority.

# Types of Risks and How to Address Them

The key risks that could materially impact the Company's performance, and the associated mitigation measures we have put in place, are described below.

# Risiko Risk

# Risiko Kredit

Credit Risk

Ada kemungkanan debitur tidak dapat membayar semua atau sebagian pinjaman atau tidak membayar secara tepat waktu dan menyebabkan Perusahaan mengalami kerugian.

# Mitigasi

# Mitigation

- Untuk mengelola risiko kredit, kami menentukan jumlah perkiraan piutang yang tidak dapat ditagih untuk akun-akun ini dan menentukan pencatatan akun penurunan nilai piutang atas piutang usaha tersebut. Untuk meminimalisir hal tersebut, kami mensyaratkan kepada konsumen untuk makukan pembayaran tunai atas melalui KPR. Untuk properti sewaan, Perusahaan mensyaratkan penyetoran deposit kepada semua tenan;  
- Kami mengendalikan eksposur risiko kredit dengan menempatkan saldo bank pada institusi keuangan yang layak dan dapat dipercaya;  
- Kami juga memuat akun penurunan nilai piuntang atas piutang usaha yang timbul dari kemungkanan ketidakmampuan konsumen untuk memenuhi kewajibanya terhadap kami.

# Risiko

# Risk

There is a possibility that a customer may not pay part or all of a receivable or may not pay in a timely manner, causing the Company to incur a loss.

# Risiko Likuiditas

Liquidity Risk

Risiko ini timbul dari kemungkan Perusaan akan mengalami kesulitan dalam memenuhi komitmen dan liabilitasnya kepada pihak kreditur saat jatuh tempo pembayaran.

This risk arises from the possibility that the Company will have difficulty in meeting its commitments and liabilities to creditors on the due date.

# Risiko Suku Bunga

Interest Rate Risk

Ini adalah risiko bahwa nilai wajar atau arus kas kontraktual masa depan dari instrumen keuanganan akan terpengaruh karena perubahan suku bungaasar. Saat ini kami tidak terpapar risiko suku bunga karena Perusahaan tidak berinvestasi dalam instrumen keuanganan dan nilai pinjaman bank juga relatif kecil.

This is the risk that the fair value or future contractual cash flows of a financial instrument will be affected due to changes in market interest rates. We are currently not exposed to interest rate risks because the Company does not invest in financial instruments and the value of any bank loans is also relatively small.

# Risiko Mata Uang Asing

Foreign Exchange Risk

Risiko mata uang asing terjadi dalam nilai bisnis instrumen keuangkan karena fluktuasi nilai tukar. Saat ini tidak ada risiko nilai mata uang asing karena kami menjalankan sebagian要比ar bisnis kami dalam Rupiah.

Foreign exchange risks occur within the business value of financial instruments due to the fluctuation of exchange rates. At this time there is no foreign exchange risk because we conduct most of our business in Rupiah.

# Evaluasi Efektivitas Manajemen Risiko Tahun 2024

Audit Internal melakukan penilaian bergala terhadap efektivitas sistem manajemen risiko. Berdasarkan penilaian tersebut, Manajemen menetapkan kebujakan dan perbaikan operational yang diperlukanagarystemdapat memberikan dukungan yang lebihefektif terhadap bisnis Perusahaan. Berdasarkan temuan Audit Internal pada tahun 2024, kami yakin oleh sstem manajemen risiko telah mencaku seluruh cakupan kegiatan bisnis kami secara memadai dan secara efektif melindungi kepentingan Perusahaan.

# Mitigasi

# Mitigation

- To manage credit risk, we determine the approximate amount that cannot be billed for these accounts and determine the establishment of accounts receivable for the impairment of trade receivables. To minimize this, we require customers to make payments in cash or through a home loan. For rental properties, the Company requires a deposit payment from all tenants;  
- We control credit risk exposure by placing the bank balances at financial institutions that are feasible and reliable;  
- We have established an allowance account to cover the possibility of subscribers' inability to fulfill their obligations to us.

- Manajemen melakukan perencanaan bulanan dan pemantauan yang ketat terhadap realisi serta saldo kas setiap minggu;  
- Kami mengelola risiko likuiditas dengan terus menjaga dan menyediakan jumlah kas dan setara kas sesuai dengan kebutuhan operasional. Kami juga secara Berkala mendelevaluasi proyeksi arus kas dan arus kas aktual, serta tanggal jatuh tempo aset dan kewajiban.  
- Management conducts monthly planning and conducts strict monitoring of the realization and the cash balance every week;  
- We are managing liquidity risk by continuously maintaining and providing the amount of cash and cash equivalents following operational requirements. We also regularly evaluate cash flow projections and actual cash flows, as well as the schedule date of maturity of assets and financial liabilities.  
- Perusahaan mengelola(Beban bunga melalui kombiniasi utang suku bunga tetap dan suku bunga variabel, dengan mengevaluasi tren suku bungaasar;  
- Manajemen juga makalkan penelaahan berbagai suku bunga yang ditawarkan oleh kreditur untuk mendapatkan suku bunga yang menguntungan sebelum dengan mengambil keputusan untuk menadataangani perjanjian utang.  
- The Company manages interest expense through a combination of fixed-rate debt and variable interest rates, by evaluating the market interest rate trends;  
- Management also reviews the various interest rates offered by lenders to obtain favorable interest rates before deciding to enter into a debt agreement.  
- Transaksi usaha dalam matauang asingnya dilakukan untuk hal-hal khusus dan, jika hal tersebut terjadi, makam Manajemen akan melakukan kajian berkala atas eksposur matauang asing tersebut.  
- Business transactions in foreign currencies are only conducted for specific matters, and if this happens then Management will conduct periodic reviews of the foreign currency exposure.

Our Code of Conduct offers a framework for implementing the principles of good corporate governance in our day-to-day business. All employees are expected to abide by and practice the ethical standards and behaviors described in the Code in order to ensure that we do business with integrity, fairness, and transparency. We believe that by upholding the Code consistently and enforcing sanctions for any Code violations, we protect the rights and interests of our stakeholders in accordance with our corporate values.

# Bentuk Sosialisasi Kode Etik dan Upaya Penegakannya

Karyawanbaru akan menerima orientasi atas Kode Etik dan nilai-nilai perusahaan Selama masa pengenalan, dan diberikan salinan panduan Kode Etik. Berbagai aspek Kode Etik diperkuat secara Berkala melaluiRAPAT internal, pertemuan, dan sesi pelatihan.

Kepatuhan terhadap tata laku dievaluasi oleh Audit Internal-Sebagai bagian dari proses audit rutinnya. Di tingkat individu, kepadahan ditinjau melalui evaluasi kinerja tahunan kanyakan, yang dinilai berdasarkan Key Behavior Indicators yang mengaku pada Kode Etik.

Dugaan pelanggaran Kode Etik dapat dilaporkan ke Komite Etika Grup Jaya untuk ditinjau. Jika laporan tersebut terbukti, Perusahaan dapat menjakhtan sanksi yang sesuai dengan tingkat kepadaan dan dampak dari kasus tersebut, sesuai dengan hukum dan peraturan perundang-undangan yang berlaku.

# Penerapan Kode Etik di Seluruh Perusahaan

Kode Etik berlaku anggota Direksi, anggota Dewan Komisaris, dan seluruh kanyakan Perusahaan.

# Code of Conduct Socialization and its Implementation Efforts

New employees receive an orientation to the Code of Conduct and the corporate values during their induction and are given a copy of the Code Manual. Various aspects of the Code of Conduct are periodically reinforced through internal meetings, gatherings, and training sessions.

Code compliance is evaluated by the Internal Audit as part of its routine audit process. At the individual level, compliance is reviewed through employees' annual performance evaluations, during which they are assessed on Key Behavior Indicators that are based on the Code of Conduct.

Suspected violations of the Code of Conduct may be reported to the Jaya Group's Ethics Committee for review. If the report is substantiated, the Company may impose sanctions commensurate with the severity and impact of the case, in accordance with the prevailing laws and regulations.

# Company-wide Application of the Code of Conduct

The Code of Conduct applies to members of the Board of Directors, members of the Board of Commissioners, and all employees of the Company.

# Policy on Disclosure of Information on Share Ownership of Members of the Board of Directors and Board of Commissioners

Sesuai dengan Piagam Direksi dan Dewan Komisaris Perusahaan, anggota Direksi dan anggota Dewan Komisaris yang memiliki saham dengan hak suara baik langsung maupun tidak langsung wajib menjentampiakan laporan kepemilikan hak suara atas saham dan setiap perubahan kepemilikan hak suara atas saham Perseroan kepada Otoritas Jasa Keuangan paling lambat 5 (lima) hari kerja-Sejak terjadinya kepemilikan hak suara atas saham atas setiap perubahan kepemilikan hak suara atas saham Perseroan.

Seluruh anggota Direksi dan anggota Dewan Komisaris telah melaporkan kepada Otoritas Jasa Keuangan mengai kepemilikan dan setiap perubahan kepemilikannya atas saham Perseroan tersebut waktu selama tahun 2024.

In accordance with the Board of Directors and Board of Commissioners Charter, members of the Board of Directors and members of the Board of Commissioners who hold shares with direct or indirect voting rights are required to submit a report on the ownership of voting rights on shares and any changes in ownership of voting rights on shares of the Company to the Financial Services Authority no later than 5 (five) business days after the occurrence of ownership of voting rights on shares or any changes in ownership of voting rights on shares of the Company.

All members of the Board of Directors and members of the Board of Commissioners have reported to the Financial Services Authority regarding ownership and any changes in their ownership of the Company's shares on time during 2024.

# Sistem Pelaporan Pelanggaran Whistleblowing System

Sistem Pelaporan Pelanggaran dirancang untuk memastikan setiap pihak yang bertindak secara illegal kepada tidak pantas dengan melanggar Kode Etik kami dapat dimintai pertanggungjawaban seraya melindungi orang-orang yang terkena dampak kepada melaporkan pelanggaran tersebut.

# Cara Penyampaian Laporan Pelanggaran

Kami mendorong karyawan untuk melaporkan jikamerekemengalami,menyaksikan,atau mencurigai adanyapelanggaran di dalam Perusahaan dengan melaporkannyasepada atas langsung mereka. Mereka juga memiliki pilihan untuk melapor langsung kepada Unit Audit Internalatau ke Manager SDM.

# Perlindungan bagi Pelapor

Kami memastikan tidak akan ada tindakan balas dendam terhadap siapa pun yang melaporkan potensi pelanggaran dengan menjaga kerahasiaan identitas mereka. Karyawan dapat melaporkan secara anomim jika menginginkanya.

# Penanganan Pengaduan

Laporan yang masuk akan dievaluasi oleh tim investigasi. Jika tutuhan tersebut terbukti, Perusahaan dapat menjatuhkan sanksi kepada orang untuk orang-orang yang bersangkutan dan/atau menjadi penesuaian untuk memastikan agar hal tersebut tidak terulang kembali.

# Pihak yang Mengelola Pengaduan

Sistem Pelaporan Pelanggaran dikelola oleh Internal Audit, SDM dan Komite Etik Grup Jaya.

# Laporan Pelanggaran Tahun 2024

Tidak ada kasus yang dilaporkan oleh diproses melalui system pelaporan pelanggaran pada tahun 2024.

# Sanksi

Sanksi disipliner Hijatuhkan, sesuai dengan kebijakan Perusahaan, dengan mempertimbangkan tingkat kepada dan dampak pelanggaran tersebut. Sanksi dapat berkitas dari peringatan lisan tingga dan termasuk skorsing, penurunan pangkat, pemotongan gaji, dan pemecatan.

Perusahaan tidak menjadikan sanksi disiplin apa pun pada tahun 2024.

The whistleblowing system is designed to ensure that any parties who act illegally or inappropriately in breach of our Code of Conduct can be held accountable while safeguarding those who are impacted by or report such misconduct.

# Reporting Procedure

We strongly encourage employees to speak up if they experience, witness or suspect misconduct within the Company by reporting it to their line manager. They also have the option of reporting directly to the Internal Audit Unit or to the HRD Manager.

# Protection for Whistleblowers

We ensure that there will be no retaliation against anyone who reports potential misconduct by keeping their identity strictly confidential. Employees may report anonymously if they prefer to.

# Whistleblower Report Handling

Incoming reports are evaluated by an investigative team. If the allegation is substantiated, the Company may impose sanctions on the person or persons concerned and/or make changes to ensure that it does not happen again.

# Whistleblowing System Manager

The whistleblowing system is managed by the Internal Audit, HRD and the Jaya Group Ethics Committee.

# Whistleblowing Reports in 2024

No cases were reported or processed through the whistleblowering system in 2024.

# Sanctions

Disciplinary sanctions are imposed, in accordance with Company policy, by taking into account the severity and impact of the violation. Sanctions may range from verbal warnings up to and including suspension, demotion, salary deduction, and dismissal.

The Company did not impose any disciplinary sanctions in 2024.

# Budaya Perusahaan

# Corporate Culture

Perusahaan telah mengidentifikasi lima nilai yang tertanam di seluruh organisasi dan dalam semua tindakan dan interaksi kami dengan orang lain. Nilai-nilai tersebutunjut kepada dasar untuk menjalankan bisnis secara berkelanjutan dan berintegritas dengan cara yang menciptakan nilai bagi semua pemangku kepentingan kami. Nilai-nilai tersebut, yang dijelaskan dalam buku pedoman Kode Etik, mewakili budaya perusahaan kami.

# a. Integritas

Bersikap jujur dan konsisten menujukkan perilaku yang etis dan bermoral dengan cara:

- Menempatkan kepentingan Perseroan di atas kepentingan pribadi;  
- Menghindari benturan kepentingan;  
- Tidak terlibat dalam sikap yang negatif dan berkelakuan buruk;  
- Tidak mengambil kesempatan untuk memperoleh keuntungan bagi diri sendiri kepada relasi-relasinya.

# b. Kewajaran

Bertindak wajar dan bermatabat:

- Memberikan kesempatan dan perilakuan yang setara kepada seluruh kandidat dalam hal rekrutmen oleh promosi;  
- Tidak memberi tugas-tugas yang melampaui kapabilitas dan tanggung jawab seseorang;  
- Menilai(PCAPAAN)dan mempromosikan karyawan berdasarkan kinerja bukanya berdasarkan hubungan kekeluargaan;  
- Memberikan hukuman atas kesalahan-kesalahan secara tetas dan PENH pertimbangan.

# c. Komitmen

Menepati janji, dapat diandalkan, dan berdedikasiPTHUH dalam melaksanan:

- Komitmen terhadap (eksternal) pelanggan atas jadwal, kualitas, dan biaya pekerjaan sebagaimana tertulis didalam kontrak;  
- Komitmen terhadap subkontraktor/pemasok untuk aktivukan pembayaran kepada waktu;  
- Komitmen untuk menyelesaikan pekerjaan (pelanggan Internal);

The Company has identified five values that are embedded across the organization and in all our actions and interactions with others. They provide the foundation for doing business sustainably and with integrity in a way that creates value for all our stakeholders. The values, which are explained in the Code of Conduct manual, represent our corporate culture.

# a. Integrity

Being honest and consistently displaying ethical and moral behavior by:

- Putting the interests of the Company above personal interests;  
- Avoiding conflicts of interest;  
Not engaging in negative attitudes and misconduct;  
Not taking the opportunity to benefit themselves or their relatives.

# b. Fairness

Acting fairly and with dignity:

Providing opportunities and equal treatment to all candidates with regard to recruitment or promotion;  
Not assigning tasks that exceed the person's capabilities and responsibilities;  
Assessing achievements and promoting employees based on performance instead of familiarity;  
Giving penalties for errors firmly yet considerably.

# c. Commitment

Keeping promises, being reliable and fully dedicated to fulfilling:

Commitments to (external) customers on schedule, with the quality and cost of the work as stated in the contract;  
- Commitments to sub-contractors/suppliers to make payments on time;  
Commitments to complete tasks (internal customers);

# d. Disiplin

Konsisten情况进行 tujuan, strategi, dan kebikan:

- Melakukan pekerjaan seksuai dengan tugas dan tanggung jawab;  
- Tidak setzen impang darijisena jasa,targetasar,dan bisnis yang ditetapkan oleh Perseroan;  
- Tidak��ngdari parameter/kendala yang diperbolehkan oleh Perseroan.

# e. Motivasi

Keinginan untuk melakukan pekerjaan berdasarkan dorongan untuk mencapai yang terbaik dalam hal:

Kepuasan pelanggan;  
- Bertahan ditengah berbagai hambatan.

# d. Discipline

Consistent with the objectives, strategies and policies:

- Carrying out work in accordance with duties and responsibilities;  
- Not deviating from the type of service, target market, and business established by the Company;  
- Not deviating from parameters/constraints that have been granted by the Company.

# e. Motivation

The impulse to do a job is based on the drive to achieve the best:

- Customer satisfaction;  
To persist in the midst of obstacles.

# Keberagaman Dewan Komisaris dan Direksi Diversity of the Board of Commissioners and Board of Directors

Anggota Dewan Komisaris dan Direksi PT Jaya Real Property Tbk diangkat berdasarkan pengetahuan, keterampilan, dan pengalaman yangmereka berikan sebagai Dewan Komisaris dan Direksi, tanpa memandangjenis kelamin, usia, latar belakang ras/etnis atas agamanya.

Perusahaan mayakini keanggotaan Dewan Komisaris dan Direksiatat ini telah mencerminkan keberagaman dan keseimbangan kompetensi dan perspektif yang diferlukan untuk mencapai tujuan pertumbuhan berkelanjutan Perusahaan.

The members of the Board of Commissioners and the Board of Directors of PT Jaya Real Property Tbk are appointed solely on the basis of the knowledge, expertise, and experience they bring to the Board, regardless of their gender, age, racial/ ethnic background, or religion.

The Company believes that the membership of the current Boards provides the diversity and balance of competencies and perspectives required to achieve the Company's sustainable growth objectives.

# Prinsip 4

Meningkatkan Kualitas Pelaksanaan Tugas dan Tanggung Jawab Dewan Komisaris.

Principle 4

Strengthen the Quality of Execution of the Board of Commissioners Duties and Responsibilities.

4.1

Dewan Komisaris mempunyai kebikan Self-Assessment untuk tidak ini kinerja Dewan Komisaris.

Kebijakan Penilian Sendiri (Self-Assessment) Dewan Komisaris merupakan suatu pedoman yang digunakan sebagai bentuk akuntabilitas atas penilaian kinerja Dewan Komisaris secara kolegial. Self-Assessment untuk penilaian sendiri dimaksud dilakukan oleh masing-masing anggota untuk menilai pelaksanaan kinerja Dewan Komisaris secara kolegial, dan bukan menilai kinerja individual masing-masing anggota Dewan Komisaris. Dengan adanya Self-Assessment ini diharapkan masing-masing anggota Dewan Komisaris dapat berkontribusi untuk memperbaiki kinerja Dewan Komisaris secara berkesinambungan. Dalam kebikan tersebut dapat mencakup kegiatan penilaian yang dilakukan beserta maksud dan tujuannya, waktu pelaksanaannya secara Berkala, dan tidak ukur ata kriteria penilaian yang digunakan为主线 dengan dengan rekomendasi yang diberikan oleh fungsi Remunerasi dan Nominasi Perusahaan Terbuka, dimana adanya fungsi tersebut telah diwajibkan dalam Peraturan OJK tersebut Komite Remunerasi dan Nominasi Emiten kepada Perusahaan Publik.

The Board of Commissioners has a policy on Self-Assessment to evaluate the performance of the Board of Commissioners

The policy on the Self-Assessment of the Board of Commissioners is a guideline that should be used as a form of accountability in the performance assessment of the Board of Commissioners on a collegial basis. The self-assessment is intended to be done by each member to evaluate the performance of the Board of Commissioners collectively, and not to assess the individual performance of members of the Board of Commissioners. The use of self-assessment is expected to enable each member of the Board of Commissioners to contribute to the continuous improvement of the Board of Commissioners performance. This policy can include the assessment activities that are done as well as their purpose, scheduling, and assessment criteria used in accordance with the recommendations of the Remuneration and Nomination function of the public company, which is required by the FSA regulation on the Nomination and Remuneration Committee of the Issuer or Public Company.

YES

# Rekomendasi OJK OJK Recommendation

Members of the Board of Directors who head accounting or finance areas have expertise in and/or knowledge of accounting.

# Keterangan atas Rekomendasi OJK Remarks on OJK Recommendation

The financial statement is the management's accountability report on the management of the public company's resources, which must be compiled and presented in accordance with the generally accepted Financial Accounting Standards in Indonesia as well as the relevant OJK regulations, including the Capital Market laws and regulations that govern the presentation and announcement of the financial statements of a public company. According to the Capital market laws and regulations that regulate the Board of Directors' responsibility for the financial statements, the Board of Directors is jointly and severally liable for the financial statements, which are signed by the President Director and the members of the Board of Directors that head the financial or accounting sections. Therefore, the disclosure and compilation of the information presented in the financial statements is highly dependent on the expertise and/or knowledge of the Board of Directors, specifically the members of the Board of Directors who head the financial or accounting sections. The minimum accounting qualifications, expertise and/or knowledge that the Board of Directors must have is intended to provide assurance on the compilation of the financial statements, such that the financial statements can be relied upon by the stakeholders as the basis for taking economic decisions related to the public company. The expertise and/or knowledge can be proven by relevant educational background, training certificates and/or work experience.

Dengan adanya Self-Assessment ini diharapkan masingmasing anggota Direksi dapat berkontribusi untuk memperbaiki kerija Direksi secara berkesinambungan. Dalam kebikan tesebut tidak mencakup kegiatan penilaian yang dilakukan beserta maksud dan tujuannya,[waku pelaksanaanya secara bergala, dan_tolak utur kriteria penilaian yang digunakan sesuai dengan rekomendasi yang diberikan oleh fungsi nominasi dan remunerasi Perusahaan Terbuka, dimana pembentukan fungsi tersebut telah diwajibkan dalam Peraturan OJKtentang Komite Nominasi dan Remunerasi Emiten akan Perusahaan Publik.

Perusahaan Terbuka memiliki kebjikan pemberian insertif jangka panjang kepada Direksi dan karyawan.

# Keterangan atas Rekomendasi OJK Remarks on OJK Recommendation

Insertif jangka panjang merupakan indentif yang didasarkan atas pencapaian kinerja jangka panjang. Rencana indentif jangka panjang mempunyai dasar pemikiran kepada kinerja jangka panjang perusahaan tercermin oleh pertumbuhan nilai dari saham oleh target-target jangka panjang perusahaan lainnya. Insertif jangka panjang bermanfaat dalam rangka menjaga loyalitas dan memberikan motivasi kepada Direksi dan karyawan untuk mencukatkan kinerja oleh Produktivitasnya yang akan berdampak pada pengkatan kinerja perusahaan dalam jangka panjang. Adanya suatu kebikan indentif jangka panjang merupakan komitmen yangaku Perusahaan Terbuka untuk mendorong pelaksanaan pemberian indentif jangka panjang kepada Direksi dan Karyawan dengan syarat, prosedur dan bentuk yang disesuaikan dengan tujuan jangka panjang Perusahaan Terbuka. Kebikan dimaksud dapat mencaku antara lain maksud dan tujuan pemberian indentif, dan kondisi dan risiko yang harus diferoperatifkan oleh Perusahaan Terbuka dalam pemberian indentif. Kebikan tersebut juga dapat tercakup dalam kebikan remunerasi Perusahaan Terbuka yang ada.

The Public Listed Company has a policy of providing long-term incentives to Directors and employees.

Long-term incentives are incentives based on the achievement of long-term performance. The long-term incentive plan is based on the premise that the long-term performance of the company is reflected by the growth in the value of shares or other long-term targets of the company. Long-term incentives are useful in order to maintain loyalty and provide motivation to Directors and employees to improve their performance or productivity which will have an impact on improving company performance in the long term. The existence of a long-term incentive policy is a real commitment of a Public Listed Company to encourage the implementation of long-term incentives to Directors and Employees with terms, procedures and forms that are adjusted to the long-term goals of the Public Listed Company. The policy may include, among others, the purpose and objectives of granting long-term incentives, terms and procedures in granting incentives, and conditions and risks that must be considered by the publicly listed Company in granting incentives. Such policy may also be included in the existing remuneration policy of the Public Listed Company.

# Keterangan atas Rekomendasi OJK Remarks on OJK Recommendation

The Capital Market rules and regulations that govern the submission of the annual report of a public company include the obligation to disclose information about shareholders who own  $5\%$  (five percent) or more of a public company's shares as well as the requirement to disclose information about the main and controlling shareholders of a public company, both directly and indirectly up to the ultimate beneficial owner in those shareholdings. These Corporate Governance Guidelines recommend disclosing the ultimate beneficial owner of a stake in a public company of at least  $5\%$  (five percent), in addition to disclosing the ultimate beneficial owner of the shareholdings of the main and controlling shareholders.

# 06 Laporan Keberlanjutan Sustainability Report

# Strategi Keberlanjutan

# Sustainability Strategy

Kami berkomitmen untuk selalu berusaha menanamkan praktik keberlanjutan dan tanggung jawab sosial dalam organisasi dan operasinya, serta dalam kegiatan sosial dan lingkungan kami.

Konsep pembangunan berkelanjutan yang digunakan adalah pembangunan yang memenuhi kebutuhan—that is, mengorbankan pembenuhan kebutuhan.—generasi.—masa.—depan. Kami meyakini pendekatan berkelanjutan.—sebagai.—sarana.—untuk.—mencapai.—dan.—mempertaharkan.—kelangsungan.—bisnis.—dengan.—berupaya.—mingkatan.—nilai.—tambah.—bagi.—semua.—pemangku.—kestentingan.—namun.—tetap.—memperhatikan.—dampak.—negatif.—dari.—produk.—dan.—operasional.—kami.

Strategi berkelanjutan yang dilakukan oleh Perusahaan mencyangkut empat pilar yaitu Lingkungan, Praktik Ketenagakerjaan, Sosial, dan Barang & Jasa.

Keberlanjutan dalam lingkungan meliputi hal-hal sebagai berikut:

- Membantu mengurangi perubahan iklim dan pelestarian lingkungan melalui program-programseperti penananan pohon, ruang terbuka hijau, biopori, jalur sepeda dan pejalan kaki,serta transportasi umum;  
- Menggunakan bahan material yang ramah lingkungan;  
- Mengmunakan konsep green building yang mencogoptimalkan pencahayaan dan ventilasi alami;  
- Memasang panel surya pada(Beperapa cluster untuk sumber energia terbarukan;  
Melakukan pengelolaan sampah;  
- Tidak seksgunakan air tanah.

Keberlanjutan dalam praktik ketenagakerjaan meliputi hal-hal sebagai berikut :

- Menyediakan asuransi kesehatan bagi karyawan;  
Mengikutsertakan karyawan dalam BPJS Ketenagakerjaan;  
- Memberi remunerasi yang layak dan kompetitif sebagai penghargaan atas dedikasi, loyalitas dan kinerja karyawan;  
Memberikan pelatihan untuk mengkatkan kemampuan dan keahlian karyawan;  
- Menghormati keragaman, menolak diskriminasi atas dasarjisKelaminatau latarbelakang,dan memberi akses yang setara dalam hal peluang karir di Perusahaan, di mana semua keputusan yang terkait remunerasi, promosi dan pelatihan didasari pada prestasi dan tujuan strategis Perusahaan;  
- Mewajibkan semua kontraktor, vendor, dan mitra bisnis lain yang bekerja atasNama Perusahaan untuk mematuhi standar dan prosedur kesehatan dan keselamatan kami;

We commit to always strive to embed sustainability and social responsibility practices in our organization and its operations, as well as in our social and environmental activities.

The concept of sustainable development is one that meets the needs of the present without compromising the needs of future generations. We believe in a sustainable approach as a way to achieve and maintain business continuity by enhancing value for all stakeholders while considering the negative impacts of our products and operations.

The Company's sustainability strategy involves four pillars: Environment, Labor Practices, Social, and Goods & Services.

Sustainability in the environment includes the following:

Helping mitigate climate change and preserve the environment through programs such as tree planting, green open spaces, biopores, bicycle and pedestrian paths, and public transportation;  
Using eco-friendly materials;  
Using a green building concept which optimizes natural lighting and ventilation;  
- Installing solar panels on several clusters for renewable energy sources;  
Conducting waste management;  
No use of groundwater.

Sustainability in labor practices includes the following:

Providing health insurance for employees;  
- Including employees in the BPJS Employment social insurance scheme;  
Providing appropriate and competitive remuneration as a reward for dedication, loyalty and employee performance;  
- Providing training to improve employee skills and expertise;  
- Respecting diversity, rejecting discrimination on the basis of gender or background, and providing equal access to all in terms of career opportunities in the Company, where all decisions related to remuneration, promotion and training are based on merit and the Company's strategic objectives;  
- Requiring all contractors, vendors and other business partners working on behalf of the Company to comply with our health and safety standards and procedures;

Keberlanjutan dalam sosial meliputi hal-hal sebagai berikut :

Memberikan donasi dan program bebasiswa bagi masyarakat dan kanyakan melalui Yayasan Marga Pembangunan Jaya;  
- Meningkatkan nilai ekonomi bagi masyarakat sekitar.

Keberlanjutan dalam Barang dan jasa meliputi hal-hal sebagai berikut :

- Mengembangkan rumah yang dapat diakses oleh berbagai lapisan masyarakat;  
- Memberi akses ke informasi yang komprehensif tersebut Produk kami, peluncuran Produkbaru, penawaran dan promosi langsung dari tim pemasaran kami yang terlatih dan melalui saluran media sosial dan situs web kami;  
- Melibatkan pemangku kepentingan dalam meninjaumasalah keberlanjutan kami melalui berbagai pendekatan speerti diskusi kelompok terfokus (FGD), survei kepuasan pelanggan dan penyewa, dan survei keterlibatan karyawan;  
- Meningkatkan pelayanan dan kualitas serta keamananproduk.

Social sustainability includes the following:

Providing donations and scholarship programs for the community and employees through Marga Pembangunan Jaya Foundation;  
- Increasing economic value for the surrounding community.

Sustainability in goods and services includes the following:

Developing homes that are accessible to people from all walks of life;  
Providing access to comprehensive information about our products, new product launches, offers and promotions directly from our trained marketing team and through our social media channels and website;  
- Engaging stakeholders in reviewing our sustainability issues through various approaches such as focus group discussions (FGDs), customer and tenant satisfaction surveys, and employee engagement surveys;  
Improving service and product quality and safety.

# Pencapaian kinerja lingkungan pada tahun 2024

# Environmental performance achievements in 2024

Konservasi keanekaragaman hayati

Biodiversity conservation

Upaya yang dilakukan pada kawasan pengembangan kami di tahun 2024 meliputi menanam pohon, memasok air permukaan untuk mengurangi/beban sistem drainase lingkungan, memasang fitur dalam melestarikan air tanah. Kami juga telah bekerjasama dengan PT Sumampau Pembangunan Lestari untuk membrgangun Aviary Park, yaitu tempat wisata sekalius pusat edukasi tersebut berbagai jeris fauna khususnya burung. Konsep dari Aviary Park adalah kepada binatang mini untuk edukasi dan konservasi, terutama burung dan kupu-kupu. Aviary Park berdiri di ataslahan seleus 6 Ha, dilengkapi dengan 5 zona akan ekosistem sesuai habitat satwa, yaitu: Hutan Hujan, Rawa, Danau, Gurun, dan Sabana.

Initiatives in our development areas in 2024 included planting trees, supplying surface water to reduce the burden on environmental drainage systems, installing features to preserve groundwater, and collaborating with PT Sumampau Pembangunan Lestari to build Aviary Park, which is a tourist attraction as well as a center for learning. The concept of Aviary Park is a mini zoo for education and conservation, of various types of fauna, especially birds and butterflies. Aviary Park stands on an area of  $6\mathrm{Ha}$ , equipped with 5 zones or ecosystems according to animal habitat, namely: Rainforest, Swamp, Lake, Desert, and Savannah.

# Aspek Sosial

Social Aspect

Sebagai pengembang kami senantiasa berupaya seksuikan perbaikan atas Produk dan layanan konsumen. secara Berkala kami meninjau dan menc Gatkan spesifikasi desain material kami seraya seksuikan pengawasan yang ketat terhadap kinerja kontraktor.

Perusahaan jugaBERkomitmen untuk memberikan dampak sosial yang positif bagi lingkungan sekitar area pengembangan melalui aktifitas bisnis dengan mengutamakan warga sekitar untuk bekerja dilingkungan kawasan pengembangan projek kami. Selainitu kami telah mengalokasikan Dana untuk pemberian bantuan bebasisa kepada 160 anak sebesar Rp 1,14 miliar, hal iniagar mereka dapat melanjutkan sekolah tingga jenjang yang lebih tinggi.

Dalam rangka mencatingkatkan minat baca anak, kami mendirikan Rumah Baca di Kawasan Bintaro Jaya. Setiap anak dapat membaca dan belajar secara gratis. Salah tahun program dari Rumah Baca yaitu membrantu anak-anak yang kesulitan dalam belajar, baik itu membraca ataupun berhitung. Kegiatan ini diberikan jadwal 2 kali dalam seminggu dengan 1 jam pertemuan. Selain belajar mereka juga diajak bermain dan Berkreasi speerti membruat mainan sendiri, dan lain sebagainya.

As a developer, the Company constantly strives to improve our products and customer service. We regularly review and improve our material design specifications while closely monitoring contractor performance.

The Company is also committed to delivering a positive social impact to the neighborhood around the development area through our business activities by prioritizing local residents to work within our project development area. Furthermore, we have allocated funds to provide scholarship assistance to 160 children amounting to Rp 1.14 billion, so that they can continue their education to a higher level.

As part of our efforts to increase children's interest in reading, we established a reading house in the Bintaro Jaya area. Every child can read and learn for free. One of the programs of Rumah Baca is to help children who have difficulty in learning, be it reading or counting. The program consists of hourly sessions twice a week with 1 hour of meeting. In addition to learning they are also invited to play and be creative through activities such as making their own toys, and so on.

# Corporate Values

The Company has identified five core values that are embedded throughout the organization and reflected in all actions and interactions with others. These values serve as the foundation for conducting business sustainably and with integrity, creating value for all stakeholders. The values, which are described in our of Code of Ethics, represent our corporate culture:

# 1. Integrity

Exemplifying honesty and consistently demonstrating ethical and moral behavior by:

- Putting the interests of the Company above personal interests;  
- Avoiding conflicts of interest;  
Not engaging in negative attitudes and misconduct;  
Not taking the opportunity to benefit themselves or their relatives.

# 2. Kewajaran

# Bertindak wajar dan bermartabat:

- Memberikan kesempatan dan perilakuan yang setara kepada seluruh kandidat dalam hal rekrutmen oleh promosi;  
- Tidak memberi tugas-tugas yang melampaui kapabilitas dan tanggung jawab seseorang;  
- Menilai(PC) Pencapaian dan mempromosikan karyawan berdasarkan kinerja bukanya berdasarkan hubungan kekeluargaan;  
- Memberikan hukuman atas kesalahan-kesalahan secara tegas dan penuh pertimbangan.

# 3. Komitmen

Menepati janji, dapat diandalkan, dan berdedikasi penuh dalam melaksanakan:

- Komitmen terhadap (eksternal) pelanggan atas jadwal, kualitas dan biaya pekerjaan sebagai tertulis di dalam kontrak;  
- Komitmen terhadap subkontraktor/pemasok untuk makukan pembayaran kepada waktu;  
- Komitmen untuk menyelesaikan pekerjaan (pelanggan internal).

# 4. Disiplin

- Tidak��impang darijisena jasa,targetasar,dan bisnis yang ditetapkan oleh Perseroan;  
- Tidak��ngdari parameter/kendala yang diperbolehkan oleh Perseroan.

# 5. Motivasi

Mengerakkan motivasi untuk Unggul dan mencapai keunggulan dengan:

Kepuasan Pelanggan;  
- Bertahan di tengah berbagai tantangan.

# 2. Fairness

Acting fairly and with dignity:

Providing equal opportunities and equal treatment to all candidates concerning recruitment or promotion;  
- Not assigning tasks that exceed the person's capabilities and responsibilities;  
Assessing achievements and promoting employees based on performance instead of familiarity;  
Giving penalties for errors firmly yet considerably.

# 3. Commitment

Keeping promises, being reliable and fully dedicated to fulfilling:

# Wilayah Operational

Pengembangan properti dan bisnis komersial Perusahaan berada di wilayah Jabodetabek (Tangerang Selatan, Tangerang, Jakarta Barat, dan Jakarta Selatan) seda Semarang, Jawa Tengah.

# Produk, Lankan dan Kegiatan Usaha

Ruang lingkup kegiatan Perusahaan adalah berusaha dalam bidang pembangunan yang meliputi konstruksi dan real estat, bidang jasa yang meliputi pengelolaan air dan pengelolaan air limbah, pengangkutan dan pergudangan, penyediaan akomodasi dan penyediaan makan minum, aktivitas profesionai ilmiah dan teknis, hiburan dan rekreasi, perdagangan, dan pertanian, kehutanan, perikanan serta menjalankan usaha di bidang konservasi.

Kegiatan usaha tersebut meliputi pembebasan tanah, pengembang real estate, persewaan pusat perbelanjaan dengan proyek Bintaro Jaya, Graha Raya, Serpong Jaya, Grand Batavia, Bintaro Trade Center, Plaza Bintaro Jaya, Plaza Slipi Jaya, Pasar Senen III, Pasar Senen IV, Pasar Senen V, Pusat Grosir Senen Jaya, Jembatan Multiguna Senen Jaya, Bintaro Jaya Xchange, BX Rink, Pasar Modern, Fresh Market, Oceanarium, Double Tree Hotel, Jaya Imperial Park dan Pengelola Kawasan Bintaro serta makukan investasi pada entitas anak dan asosiasi.

# Operational Area

The Company's property development and commercial businesses are located in the Greater Jakarta area (South Tangerang, Tangerang, West Jakarta, and South Jakarta) and Semarang, Central Java.

# Product, Service and Business Activities

The Company's scope of activities relates to development sector which includes construction and real estate, the service sector which includes water management and waste water management, transportation and warehousing, provision of accommodation and provision of food and drink, scientific and technical professional activities, entertainment and recreation, trade, and agriculture, forestry, fisheries sector as well as running a business in the conservation.

The business activities include land acquisition, real estate developer, shopping center rental with Bintaro Jaya project, Graha Raya, Serpong Jaya, Grand Batavia, Bintaro Trade Center, Plaza Bintaro Jaya, Plaza Slipi Jaya, Senen III Market, Senen IV Market, Senen V Market, Senen Jaya Wholesale Center, Senen Jaya Multipurpose Bridge, Bintaro Jaya Xchange, BX Rink, Pasar Modern, Fresh Market, Oceanarium, Double Tree Hotel, Jaya Imperial Park and Bintaro Estate Management as well as investing in subsidiaries and associate.

# Nilai Keberlanjutan bagi Perusahaan

Keberlanjutan telah menjadi faktor penting dalam dunia bisnis, termasuk dalam sektor properti. Perusahaan properti yang menerapkan prinsip keberlanjutan tidak hatanya berkontribusi terhadap lingkungan dan kesejahteraan sosial, tetapi juga mencatkan daya saing dan nilai jangka panjang bisnismereka.

PT Jaya Real Property Tbk Selalu menerapkan nilai-nilai keberlanjutan didalam melakukan pengembangan Kawasan sudah statunya dengan mematuhi peraturan pemerintah yang berlaku, selain itu Perusahaan mengeluarkan Produk dengan desain menarik dan bahan material yang ramah lingkungan serta harga terjangkau. Penerapan konsep green construction berpengaruh terhadap efisiensi energia yang berdampak pada penurunan biaya operasional, serta menurunkan emisi Gas Rumah Kaca (GRK). Sedangkan pada sisi sosial masyaratkat, konsep ini mencatingkan kesehatan dan kualitas hidup para penghuni bangunan dengan penyediaan ruang-ruang terbuka hijau yang memadai.

Salah situ aspek utama dalam pembangunan berkelanjutan adalah menjaga keseimbangan lingkungan. Konsep pembangunan berkelanjutan menekankan keseimbangan antara pertumbuhan ekonomi, kesejahteraan sosial, dan pelestarian lingkungan. Oleh karena itu,;penerapan prinsip manajemen yang efektif dan berkelanjutan sangat diperlukan untuk mencapai tujuan tersebut.

# The Value of Sustainability to the Company

Sustainability has become an important factor in the business world, including in the property sector. Property companies that apply sustainability principles not only contribute to the environment and social welfare, but also increase the competitiveness and long-term value of their business.

PT Jaya Real Property Tbk always consistently applies sustainability values in developing its areas, among other means in addition by complying with applicable government regulations, besides that the Company issues products with attractive designs and environmentally friendly materials and affordable prices. The application of the green construction concept affects energy efficiency which has an impact on reducing costs for the occupants, as well as lowering harmful greenhouse gas (GHG) emissions. While on the social side of society, meanwhile this concept improves the health and quality of life of building occupants by providing access to adequate green open spaces.

One of the main aspects of sustainable development is maintaining environmental balance. The concept of sustainable development emphasizes the balance between economic growth, social welfare, and environmental preservation. Therefore, the application of effective and sustainable management principles is necessary to achieve these goals.

# Komitmen Terhadap Keberlanjutan

Dengan demikian kami berkomitmen untuk memberikan nilai nyata bagi masyarakat dan lingkungan sekalisus mengkatkan keuntungan perusahaan.

Kami memastikan tata kelola yang baik didalam menjalankan operasional bisnis perusaan. Perusahaan memperkuat pengawasan, akuntabilitas, dan keadilan di seluruh jajaran organisasi melalui pembentukan struktur manajemen yang memiliki tanggung jawab dalam melaksanakan praktik tanggung jawab keuangan, lingkungan, dan sosial. Struktur ini didukung olehSYSTEM manajemen risiko terintegrasi yang terus dipandu dan dikembangkan sejalan dengan pertumbuhan bisnis dan perkembangan lingkungan pengoperasian kami.

Dalam tersebut tantangan tersebut, kami fokus dalam pelaksanaan dan pengelolaan biaya yang disiplin, selain itu perusahaan melakukan perluasan portfolio untuk menc Gatkan nilai pada kawasan pengembangan kami,serta tanggap terhadap setup peluang yang terjadi diasar.

Perusahaan juga menghadapi tantangan sosial dan lingkungan yang signifikan, apabila dibiarkan, dapat mengancam kelangsungan usaha, termasuk bisnis kami, dan berdampak pada mata pencaharian. # Response to Issues Related to Sustainable Finance

The Company recognizes that its property and real estate business has a significant impact on the environment, especially during land acquisition.
